HouseholdElecKwhPerYearM2Atemp.help: Number indicating the electricity consumption of residential areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 20 kWh/year/m2 'atemp' comes from a 2017-2018 metering study made by Skanska, 'Hushållsel i nybyggda flerbostadshus'. 'Atemp' refers to a specific surface area measurement from which energy-related metrics are calculated. Essentially, it's the surface area which experiences a temperature modulation by an energy source.

ResidentialPropertyElecKwhPerYearM2Atemp.help: Number indicating the electricity consumption of residential buildings, EXCLUDING HOUSEHOLDS, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 15 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

ResidentialSpaceHeatKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the space heating consumption of residential areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 25 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

ResidentialHotTapWaterKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the hot tap water consumption of residential areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 25 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

RelativeErrorStdDev.display: Relative standard deviation of simulated data:
RelativeErrorStdDev.help: For a given hour, an expected value of the demand of a given energy carrier will be calculated, and the simulated value will then be this expected value, multiplied with a factor normally distributed with a mean of 1 and a standard deviation of this value. Basically, the higher this value is, the more energy demand will vary, hour-to-hour.

CommercialElecKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the electricity consumption of commercial areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 118 kWh/year/m2 comes from Energimyndigheten's 2009 report 'Energianvändning i handelslokaler'. This number is given for 'non-grocery-related' trades premises.

CommercialSpaceHeatKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the space heating consumption of commercial areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 44 kWh/year/m2 comes from BDAB (for 'kopcentrum').

CommercialHotTapWaterKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the hot tap water consumption of commercial areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 5 kWh/year/m2 comes from BDAB (for 'kopcentrum').

CommercialCoolKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the cooling consumption of commercial areas, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 34 kWh/year/m2 comes from BDAB (for 'kopcentrum').

SchoolElecKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the electricity consumption of school buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 60 kWh/year/m2 comes from Energimyndigheten's 2009 report 'Energin i skolan'.

SchoolSpaceHeatKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the space heating consumption of school buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 25 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

SchoolHotTapWaterKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the hot tap water consumption of school buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 7 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

OfficeElecKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the electricity consumption of office buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 50 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

OfficeSpaceHeatKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the space heating consumption of office buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 22 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

OfficeHotTapWaterKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the hot tap water consumption of office buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 5 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.

OfficeCoolKwhPerYearM2.help: Number indicating the cooling consumption of office buildings, in kWh per year and square meter Atemp. The default of 6 kWh/year/m2 has been provided by BDAB.
